description.value: Although difficult to accomplish, repetitive precise strikes to pressure points and areas of the head cand render a foe temporarily helpless.

system.benefits: When you hit the same creature 2+ times in one turn, you may attempt to stun: opposed [[/save type=will]] (your Wisdom + Melee Combat vs target's Wisdom + Luck). If you win target is Stunned until the end of your next turn
